GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Extract values for Lease (Lease__c) record fields from attached files.

templateVersions.content:
Instructions: """ Analyze the attached files and extract values for the fields listed below.Â
Use only the values you find in the attached files.
Return only a valid JSON object.
If there are no attached files, then include this element in your JSON output: "Error": "No files are attached to this lease."
If you can't find a particular field in the attached files, then set that field's value to null.
If the rent varies over the term of the lease, use the starting rent.
Include this element in your JSON output: "Id": "{!$Input:Lease.Id}" """
Fields: """ * Premises within Property [Text up to 255 characters] * Leased Square Footage [Integer] * Lease Structure [One of these strings: Gross Lease (Full Service Lease), Single Net Lease (N), Double Net Lease (NN), Triple Net Lease (NNN), Modified Gross Lease, Percentage Lease, Ground Lease, Other] * Renewal Option [Yes or No] * Renewal Notice Days [Integer] * Lease Start Date [Date] * Lease End Date [Date] * Monthly Base Rent [Currency] * Rent Varies [Yes or No] * Annual CAM Charges [Currency] * Annual Insurance [Currency] * Annual Property Taxes [Currency] """
Attached Files: """ {!$RelatedList:Lease.CombinedAttachments.Records} """
